settings.title: COLLECTION NO. 4
settings.text:
Our Autumn Winter 2019 is an ongoing evolution continuing our theme of artists and tastemakers of the 20th and 21st century. 

The collection is predominantly black, with hints of caramel, turmeric and brown. Special prints are inspired by the watercolours of Irene Monat Stern.

settings.text: BITE is a collective of creative thinkers and we welcome collaboration with like-minded artists, gallerists, and craftspeople.

settings.title: Environmental Philosophy
settings.text: A commitment to conserving the environment and to beautiful, durable design extends to every aspect of BITE. We offer a thoughtful, pared down wardrobe created with meticulous attention to fabrics and details.

settings.title: BITE artist collaborations
settings.text:
BITE is a collective of creative thinkers and we welcome collaboration with like-minded artists, gallerists, and craftspeople. We have joined forces with emerging and established artists on a range of work including natural dyeing techniques, prints, hand-made jewellery, sound and video installations. These works form part of the BITE universe, and are sold in select stores and online. They might even be given a second life in the BITE Archive.
Text: Tamsin Blanchard Photography: Suzanne Elvi

settings.title: Aisha Christison – Collection NO. 3
settings.text:
Favouring a more idiosyncratic painterly style, Christison collects imagery from a diverse range of sources before arranging them on a painted surface that often betrays the normal conventions of dimensional fields. Working predominantly in oil and watercolour, she tries to treat colour like a subject in the painting by allowing the imagery to bring out and amplify the properties of the colour.
For this collaboration, we treated the artworks as stand-alone pieces — not treating them as prints but re-purposing the artworks in fine organic silks. The artworks have been printed on Organic Peace Silk, hand-made and finished in London.
A limited edition of 100 pieces per style made.

settings.title: Environmental Philosophy
settings.text: A commitment to conserving the environment and to beautiful, durable design extends to every aspect of BITE. We offer a thoughtful, pared down wardrobe created with meticulous attention to fabrics and details. Each BITE piece is created with the lightest possible environmental footprint. We set ourselves high targets. 95% of the luxury materials in our collections are organic or recycled. We know there is still much work to be done. To better understand what we are doing and why our materials are so important, we invite you to read on. BITE Global agenda /  BITE Material guide / BITE Buy Back /  BITE Archive

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.text: Our artist of re-defined ocha sItet ipsaese et ulliquo optatusam faccus. Sant en ditaquos as eate volorum.
BITE Buy Back is meant to ensure a sustainable life cycle for all of our creations.
BITE Buy Back is meant to ensure a sustainable life cycle for all of our creations.

BITE Buy Back is a scheme to ensure the longest possible life for all of our creations. We take responsibility for everything we make and to close the BITE loop, we keep your old, unworn items in circulation in the BITE ARCHIVE.  We celebrate the wear and tear and the life a piece of clothing has led and we continue to value each piece long after its first wear.

BITE ARCHIVE is a selection of pieces recollected through BITE Buy Back that we clean and repair, to re-sell at a reduced price, ready for a new life. You will also find limited editions, previous collections and unique one-off pieces from our sampling room and production.

If you are no longer wearing your BITE garment, just follow the 3 easy steps below and we will arrange to collect and buy it from you.

settings.title: -  a scheme to ensure the longest possible life for all of our creations.
settings.text:
We take responsibility for everything we make and to close the BITE loop, we keep your old, unworn items in circulation in the BITE ARCHIVE. We celebrate the wear and tear and the life a piece of clothing has led and we continue to value each piece long after its first wear. BITE ARCHIVE is a selection of pieces recollected through BITE Buy Back that we clean and repair, to re-sell at a reduced price, ready for a new life. You will also find limited editions, previous collections and unique one-off pieces from our sampling room and production. If you are no longer wearing your BITE garment, just follow the 3 easy steps below and we will arrange to collect and buy it from you.
 BITE Archive

settings.title: How does the BITE buy back work? 3 simple steps
settings.text: 1. Contact us via email bitebuyback@bitestudios.com or via phone, we will be happy to arrange a collection from the address of your choice with a pre-paid re-collect label. 2. Pack the items in a rigid box and stick the pre-paid label on the box. To track your recollect, save the tracking ID on the return label. 3. Once your package has reached our warehouse (within 3-7 working days) and has been accepted, we will transfer you 20% of the original garment price.
